title: Exposing The Myths With Dr. Marc Micozzi
itunes:title: Exposing The Myths With Dr. Marc Micozzi
description:
Magic in the air… on Halloween, black is the night full of fright, you’ll be missing the day, what will be here very soon. And what better way to celebrate then with a true treat. In the first hour of the show we light up the latest Monster Series from Pete Johnson’s Tatuaje. It’s the Michael named after Michael Myers of the Halloween movies.

At the bottom of the first hour, we welcome Dr. Marc Micozzi the former Senior Investigator of cancer prevention at the National Cancer Institute. We will unmask the truth about cigar smoking, and while we know the answers, you just might be surprised by what this well respected Doctor has to say.

In the second hour we will be craving donuts, as we light up the last cigar from the October care package; Jose Dominiguez. We will also share an incredible deal on these cigars so be sure to tune in and not miss out!

All that and the usual bag of tricks Debonaire Mr. J, Asylum Barry, Cigar News, Classic 3 Way and even a few mail bags..

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.

You can learn more about Dr. Micozzi at http://www.drmicozzi.com/
